nodes.long_description:
Involve XR offers unparalleled flexibility and customization without the need for code, and integrates into enterprise data and learning management systems.

The platform operates as both a multi-user synchronous training and assessment tool, and an asynchronous learning and practice platform, deployable in both training centers and directly to remote workers at home or in the field with low cost hardware, or via flat screens.
nodes.short_description: Involve XR is an open and flexible learning & assessment platform for institutions looking to deploy data-driven, enterprise-grade, immersive training and assessment across healthcare and public safety sectors.

nodes.change_log:
***New Features:***
---
•	Screen-Based Mode: Now supports both patient and non-patient characters for more realistic collaborative and family-based care sessions.
---
•	Exam Room: Added a new detailed clinical environment for expanded healthcare training scenarios.
---
•	Conversational AI: Introduced support for Hebrew, Arabic, and Taiwanese Mandarin languages, with ongoing improvements to text-to-speech.
---
•	Patient Clothing Interaction: Learners can now adjust patient gowns during simulations for added procedural realism.
---
•	Scenario Designer: Improved UX, smoother stage transitions, clearer rule handling, and support for dynamic non-patient appearances.


***Improvements:***
---
•	Patient and Emergency Rooms: Visual updates for better quality and consistency.
---
•	Admin Portal: Enhanced Scenario Designer interface.
---
•	Windows App: Instructor - Improved Session Interface | Learner - Available for Learner
---
•	VR App (Oculus): Added haptic feedback for specific equipment.



***Known Issues and Limitations:***
---
•	Admin Portal: Some tags may appear for unintended users.
---
•	Instructor App: Installation process may be complex for non-technical users.
---
•	VR App (Oculus): Self-Directed Learning lessons may appear under Instructor-Led tab until manually switched.


***Bug Fixes***
---
•	35+ bug fixes, refined user flow, and improved stability across all platforms.

***New Features:***
---
•	Screen-Based MVP: Better cameras, smoother animations, new side panel.
---
•	Patients & NPCs: Added diverse characters (Muslim patient, Asian wife, Caucasian daughter).
---
•	Charting: Choose templates (SBAR, SOAP, DAR), chart during/after sessions.
---
•	Instructor Feedback: Add learner feedback in reports.
---
•	Equipment: Hearing aids, hairbrush, chair, water cup, thermostat, radio, light switch.
---
•	Environments: Hospice, meeting room, homecare, residential care.



***Improvements:***
---
•	Admin Portal: General updates.
---
•	OnScreen Instructor: Better welcome screen & navigation.
---
•	OnScreen Learner: Camera, assessment, EMR view improved.
---
•	VR App (Oculus): UX refinements.



***Known Issues:***
---
•	Some equipment and assessment functions limited.
---
•	Certain features deferred for future updates.



***Bug Fixes***
---
•	97+ bug fixes, stronger security, improved stability.

***New Features:***
---
•	Screen-Based Experience (Beta): First version of screen-based training now available for use outside VR.
---
•	Direct Learning Assignment: Create groups and assign Learning Experiences directly to learners.
---
•	Emotion in AI Voice: Patients now speak with emotional tones for more realistic scenarios.
---
•	Homecare Environment (In Progress): New setting under development with a more personal, residential atmosphere.



***Improvements:***
---
•	Maria Garcia now wears a full medical gown.
---
•	Admin Portal session page has an updated visual layout.
---
•	Windows installer now supports automatic updates.
---
•	Instructor session page interface improved for usability.
---
•	Haptic feedback added for key equipment in the VR app.


***Known Issues:***
---
•	Some internal tags are visible in the Admin Portal.
---
•	Installer flow may be confusing for non-technical users.
---
•	Instructor-led and Self-Directed Learning sessions may overlap in the VR app on first load.



***Bug Fixes***
---
•	35+ bugs fixed across the platform, including session creation, model visuals, and user experience flows.

New Features:

•	Syringe Pump – Now Live: A fully functional Pediatric Syringe Pump is now available, addressing key UX and technical challenges.

•	Suction Apparatus (Pediatric): This pediatric suction tool is now fully integrated, enhancing realism for young patient scenarios.

•	ECG Leads: New ECG equipment offers more realistic and detailed vital monitoring capabilities.

•	Improved Onboarding Experience: The onboarding process has been enhanced with a redesigned Welcome Screen in the White Room, an updated session list UI, and a new Welcome Pop-Up.

•	Toddler Style Update: Toddler patients can now wear street clothing, adding variety and realism to character customization.




Improvements:

•	 Patch fix for improved performance and reliability.

•	Administration Portal: Enhanced checklist management, session-end email reporting added, and clearer distinction between right and wrong answers.

•	Instructor Application: Improved visibility of patient state during simulation.

•	Learner Application (Oculus VR App): Haptic feedback added to selected medical equipment, and improved synchronization for toddler clothing and equipment.

•	Toddler Style Update: Toddler patients can now wear street clothing, adding variety and realism to character customization.
